metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000105 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed that it was not a security issue. Notes: none.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> The nginx team considers this a flaw in the environments in question; they recommend configuration settings to prevent a Proxy: header from being passed through to FastCGI or similar: fastcgi_param HTTP_PROXY ""; proxy_set_header Proxy ""; The nginx team blog post also shows how to log malicious attempts to exploit this issue.

criterions.comment: nginx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
